tool.name: OTB.SampleAugmentation
tool.description: Generates synthetic samples from a sample data file.
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayin False output_data_out $output_data_out name OTB.SampleAugmentation in $in field '$field' layer $layer label $label samples $samples exclude '$exclude' strategy $strategy strategy.jitter.stdfactor $strategy.jitter.stdfactor strategy.smote.neighbors $strategy.smote.neighbors seed $seed prefer $prefer response $response outputType_out $OutputSection_out.outputType_out transmissionMode_out $OutputSection_out.transmissionMode_out

param.name: in
param.label: Vector data file containing samples (OGR format)
param.help: Vector data file containing samples (OGR format) The following data types are allowed in the txt file: jpeg, png, tiff

param.name: field
param.label: Name of the field carrying the class name in the input vectors.
param.help: Name of the field carrying the class name in the input vectors.

param.name: layer
param.label: Layer index to read in the input vector file.
param.help: Layer index to read in the input vector file.

param.name: label
param.label: Label of the class of the input file for which new samples will be generated.
param.help: Label of the class of the input file for which new samples will be generated.

param.name: samples
param.label: Number of synthetic samples that will be generated.
param.help: Number of synthetic samples that will be generated.

param.name: exclude
param.label: List of field names in the input vector data that will not be generated in the output file.
param.help: List of field names in the input vector data that will not be generated in the output file.

param.name: strategy.jitter.stdfactor
param.label: The noise added to the input samples will have the standard deviation of the input features divided by the value of this parameter.
param.help: The noise added to the input samples will have the standard deviation of the input features divided by the value of this parameter.

param.name: strategy.smote.neighbors
param.label: Number of nearest neighbors to be used in the SMOTE algorithm
param.help: Number of nearest neighbors to be used in the SMOTE algorithm

param.name: seed
param.label: Set specific seed. with integer value.
param.help: Set specific seed. with integer value.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_out
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_out
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: The application takes a sample data file as generated by the SampleExtraction application and generates synthetic samples to increase the number of available samples.
